short_summary: Reconstruction of the Launch Ramp in Riverton, Manitoba
description: Reconstruction of the launch ramp in Riverton, Manitoba by constructing new base material, sub-base material and 20 new pre-cast concrete launch ramp pads and also demolition and removal of 20 damaged pre-cast concrete pads.  Contractor has to complete the work by 1st December 2023 as per tender details.
full_summary:
# Launch Ramp Reconstruction 2023 - Riverton, Manitoba
==============================================

## Tender Details
-----------------

*   **Contract Reference**: cb-8550-35932119
*   **Solicitation Number**: 30004828
*   **Publication Date**: August 28, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: September 11, 2023, 3:00 PM local time
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Amendment Date**: September 11, 2023

## Project Description
-----------------------

The scope of this project involves the reconstruction of the launch ramp in Riverton, Manitoba. The work includes:

*   Constructing a new section of launch ramp consisting of new base material, sub-base material, and 20 new pre-cast concrete launch ramp pads
*   Demolishing and removing 20 damaged pre-cast concrete pads

## Key Requirements
--------------------

*   The contractor must complete the work by December 1, 2023
*   The project's deliverables include a new section of launch ramp with 20 new pre-cast concrete launch ramp pads

## Tender Status
----------------

This tender has expired.

## Contact Information
---------------------

For more information, please contact:

*   **Tina Brown**
    *   Email: `Tina.Brown@dfo-mpo.gc.ca`
    *   Phone: 1 506 238 3224

## Document Attachment
-----------------------

The tender notice, including the request for quotation, is attached to this document.

http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/8550/30004828\_rq.pdf

Note: The original text has been summarized to fit the 400-word limit, and information considered redundant has been excluded. The rewritten text has been formatted using markdown for better readability.
